question.answer: I want to live in a suite.
Hall style, please!
Get me an on-campus apartment with the upperclassmen and grad students.
I don't care.
I want to live in a suite with two rooms and a bathroom even though I'd have to clean my own bathroom.
I want to live in a super suite with a living room but again, I'd have to clean my bathroom.
I want to live in a suite with four rooms and a bathroom.
I don't care.
I want to live on North Campus where I can roll out of bed and into class.
Middle, it's close to the football stadium! Go Heels!
South Campus is for me. It's where the party's at!
I don't care.
I want to live in an all girls dorm, please.
All guys dorm for me. It'll be one giant man cave!
I want to live in a coed dorm.
I want to live in a dorm that's substance free.
College without beer? I don't think so.
I don't care.
My dorm must have central air.
Central air would be nice, but window units are ok.
Who cares? I'll sweat it out if I have to.
My dorm should have a laundry room.
I don't care.
My dorm should have a TV room. I've got to have a place to watch Jersey Shore with all my friends!
I don't care.
My dorm NEEDS to have a CCI printer. I'm not going to have time to run to one of the labs to print my paper before my 8 a.m. Why do they have classes at 8 a.m. anyway?
I don't care.
My dorm should have a recreation room. I love pingpong, foosball and pool!
I don't care.
My dorm should be near volleyball, basketball or tennis courts.
I don't care.
I dig volleyball courts.
Basketball is what I care about. There are other sports? Not at Carolina!
Tennis all the way.
I don't care. I like all sports.
My dorm should have a piano.
I don't care.
I need a normal closet with a door to store all my stuff.
I'd be ok with a wardrobe or closet even though the wardrobe will take up part of our precious floor space.
Built-in wall unit with no doors, a normal closet or wardrobe? Who cares?
